keywords.title: Spotter
keywords.description: (Choose up to 2 friendly units at range 1. Each chosen unit gains an aim token.)

keywords.title: Inspire
keywords.description: (After your Rally step, remove up to 1 suppression token from another friendly unit at range 1-2.)

keywords.title: Sharpshooter
keywords.description: (While performing a ranged attack, reduce the defender's cover by 1.)
